attributes.action: A public to vote for the next party leader now that David Camaron has resigned
attributes.additional_details: I feel citizens voted without enough information to understand what they are a part of.  By electing the next prime minister for the remainder of the term it will allow those people who voted remain to have a voice and those who chose to leave the choice to pick from the emerging candidates.  Allowing for a fair choice in the future leadership of the UK.
attributes.background: It appears from Google search results on Thursday 23 evening after elections closed through to Friday the second most googled search happened to be "What is the EU?".
